title: Reliable!
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Let’s see.... Is this the right way to the meeting point with μ’s and Nijigaku members....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>There’s nothing to worry about, right? We’re used to coming to Tokyo after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>But stores around Tokyo come and go rapidly, so I think you would get lost if you rely on your memory of last time. See, look at that shopping center. It wasn’t there last time we came here<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? You’re right....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Would you look at the map with me, Yoshiko-san. I’m a bit worried....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane! ....Kuukuku! With my magical power, conquering this city is a trivial matter!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I think the map in front of us is more reliable than an invisible magical force, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Geez~! I guess it can’t be helped! ....Umm, it’s the right way, isn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank goodness.... Then, Yoshiko-san, please stay by my side, okay, it’s just the two of us in this city, so let’s stay vigilant<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Leave it to me. This Yohane will protect you with my magical power!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
